languages.text:
The cyber-eagle gains +10 Perception and deals +150% more damage. The cyber-eagle gains +{uip|Dodge|cdd71475a76f46adb072f009748e5c1a}% dodge against the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy's melee attacks.
If the cyber-eagle dodges the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy's melee attack, that enemy immediately hits its random adjacent ally using whichever attack costs the least AP and scores a guaranteed critical hit.

languages.text:
The cyber-eagle gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and deals +150% more damage. The cyber-eagle gains +{uip|Dodge|cdd71475a76f46adb072f009748e5c1a}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}.

languages.original_text:
Киберорел получает +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g} и наносит на 150% больше урона. Также он получает +{uip|Dodge|cdd71475a76f46adb072f009748e5c1a}% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} от атак в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}, совершаемых врагом, чей {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}обзор заблокирован{/g}.
Когда киберорел уклоняется от атаки в ближнем бою, совершаемой врагом, чей {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}обзор заблокирован{/g}, этот враг немедленно совершает {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическое попадание{/g} по своему случайному союзнику на соседней клетке, используя атаку, требующую меньше всего {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}.

languages.text:
Siber kartal, +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g} niteliği kazanır ve +%150 daha fazla hasar verir. Siber kartal, {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}engellenen{/g} düşmanın {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırılarına{/g} karşı +%{uip|Dodge|cdd71475a76f46adb072f009748e5c1a} {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} değeri kazanır.
Siber kartal, {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}engellenen{/g} düşmanın yakın dövüş saldırısından kaçınırsa o düşman, anında bitişiğindeki rastgele bir dost birimine en az {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} harcayan saldırısıyla {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurur{/g}. Bu saldırı yüzde yüz olasılıkla {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruş{/g} indirir.

Siber kartal, {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}engellenen{/g} düşmanın yakın dövüş saldırısından kaçınırsa o düşman, anında bitişiğindeki rastgele bir dost birimine en az EP harcayan saldırısıyla vurur. Bu saldırı yüzde yüz olasılıkla kritik vuruş indirir.

languages.text:
La ciberáguila recibe +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} e inflige un +150 % de daño adicional. La ciberáguila gana un +{uip|Dodge|cdd71475a76f46adb072f009748e5c1a} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} contra los ataques cuerpo a cuerpo del enemigo {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstruido{/g}.
Si la ciberáguila esquiva un {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataque cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} del enemigo {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstruido{/g}, este {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}golpea{/g} inmediatamente a un aliado adyacente aleatorio usando el ataque con menor coste en {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y obteniendo un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g} garantizado.

traits.locale_text:
La ciberáguila recibe +10 de Percepción e inflige un +150 % de daño adicional. La ciberáguila gana un +{uip|Dodge|cdd71475a76f46adb072f009748e5c1a} % de esquiva contra los ataques cuerpo a cuerpo del enemigo {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstruido{/g}.
Si la ciberáguila esquiva un ataque cuerpo a cuerpo del enemigo {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstruido{/g}, este golpea inmediatamente a un aliado adyacente aleatorio usando el ataque con menor coste en PA y obteniendo un impacto crítico garantizado.

languages.text:
生化猎鹰的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}提高10点，造成的伤害提高150%。当{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}视野遮蔽{/g}的敌人对生化猎鹰进行{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}时，生化猎鹰的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}提高{uip|Dodge|cdd71475a76f46adb072f009748e5c1a}%。
如果生化猎鹰闪避了{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}视野遮蔽{/g}敌人的近战攻击，则该名敌人会立刻使用{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}消耗最低的{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}攻击{/g}方式随机攻击一名相邻盟友，且此次攻击必定造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}。

The cyber-eagle gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and deals +150% more damage. The cyber-eagle gains +{uip|Dodge|cdd71475a76f46adb072f009748e5c1a}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}.
If the cyber-eagle dodges the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy's melee attack, that enemy immediately {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} its random adjacent ally using the lowest {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}-cost attack, scoring a guaranteed {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
生化猎鹰的感知提高10点，造成的伤害提高150%。当{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}视野遮蔽{/g}的敌人对生化猎鹰进行近战攻击时，生化猎鹰的闪避提高{uip|Dodge|cdd71475a76f46adb072f009748e5c1a}%。
如果生化猎鹰闪避了{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}视野遮蔽{/g}敌人的近战攻击，则该名敌人会立刻使用行动点数消耗最低的攻击方式随机攻击一名相邻盟友，且此次攻击必定造成暴击。

languages.text:
Der Cyber-Adler erhält +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} und verursacht +150 % mehr Schaden. Derr Cyber-Adler erhält +{uip|Dodge|cdd71475a76f46adb072f009748e5c1a} % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} gegen die Nahkampfangriffe des {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}gehinderten{/g} Gegners.
Wenn der Cyber-Adler dem {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriff{/g} des {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}gehinderten{/g} Gegners ausweichten, {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g} dieser Gegner sofort einen zufälligen angrenzenden Verbündeten mit dem {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}-günstigsten Angriff und landet dabei garantiert einen {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffer{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The cyber-eagle gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and deals +150% more damage. The cyber-eagle gains +{uip|Dodge|cdd71475a76f46adb072f009748e5c1a}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}.
If the cyber-eagle dodges the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy's melee attack, that enemy immediately {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} its random adjacent ally using the lowest {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}-cost attack, scoring a guaranteed {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Der Psitech-Adler erhält +10 Wahrnehmung und verursacht +150 % mehr Schaden. Derr Psitech-Adler erhält +{uip|Dodge|cdd71475a76f46adb072f009748e5c1a} % Ausweichen gegen die Nahkampfangriffe des {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}gehinderten{/g} Gegners.
Wenn der Psitech-Adler dem Nahkampfangriff des {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}gehinderten{/g} Gegners ausweichten, trifft dieser Gegner sofort einen zufälligen angrenzenden Verbündeten mit dem AP-günstigsten Angriff und landet dabei garantiert einen kritischen Treffer.

languages.text:
Le cyber-aigle reçoit un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} de +10 et inflige +150 % de dégâts supplémentaires. Le cyber-aigle gagne +{uip|Dodge|cdd71475a76f46adb072f009748e5c1a} % à l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} contre les {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaques de mêlée{/g} de l'ennemi {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstrué{/g}.
Si le cyber-aigle esquive l'attaque de mêlée d'un ennemi {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstrué{/g}, ce dernier attaque aléatoirement l'un de ses alliés adjacents avec son attaque la moins coûteuse en {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et lui inflige automatiquement un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g}.{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}{/g}
languages.original_text:
The cyber-eagle gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and deals +150% more damage. The cyber-eagle gains +{uip|Dodge|cdd71475a76f46adb072f009748e5c1a}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}.
If the cyber-eagle dodges the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy's melee attack, that enemy immediately {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} its random adjacent ally using the lowest {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}-cost attack, scoring a guaranteed {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Le psyber-aigle reçoit un bonus de Perception de +10 et inflige +150 % de dégâts supplémentaires. Le psyber-aigle gagne +{uip|Dodge|cdd71475a76f46adb072f009748e5c1a} % à l'esquive contre les attaques de mêlée de l'ennemi {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstrué{/g}.
Si le psyber-aigle esquive l'attaque de mêlée d'un ennemi {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstrué{/g}, ce dernier attaque aléatoirement l'un de ses alliés adjacents avec son attaque la moins coûteuse en PA et lui inflige automatiquement un coup critique.

languages.text:
サイバーイーグルの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}が+10され、与えるダメージが+150%上昇する。サイバーイーグルは{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}妨害された{/g}敵の{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}に対する{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}が+{uip|Dodge|cdd71475a76f46adb072f009748e5c1a}%上昇する。
サイバーイーグルが{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}妨害された{/g}敵の近接攻撃を回避した場合、その敵は即座に最小の{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を消費する攻撃で隣接するランダムな味方を{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}攻撃{/g}し、必ず{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}になる。
languages.original_text:
The cyber-eagle gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and deals +150% more damage. The cyber-eagle gains +{uip|Dodge|cdd71475a76f46adb072f009748e5c1a}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}.
If the cyber-eagle dodges the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy's melee attack, that enemy immediately {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} its random adjacent ally using the lowest {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}-cost attack, scoring a guaranteed {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
サイバーイーグルの認知力が+10され、与えるダメージが+150%上昇する。サイバーイーグルは{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}妨害された{/g}敵の近接攻撃に対する回避が+{uip|Dodge|cdd71475a76f46adb072f009748e5c1a}%上昇する。
サイバーイーグルが{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}妨害された{/g}敵の近接攻撃を回避した場合、その敵は即座に最小のAPを消費する攻撃で隣接するランダムな味方を攻撃し、必ずクリティカルヒットになる。

サイバーイーグルの認知力が+10され、与えるダメージが+150%上昇する。サイバーイーグルは{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}妨害された{/g}敵の近接攻撃に対する回避が+{uip|Dodge|cdd71475a76f46adb072f009748e5c1a}%上昇する。
サイバーイーグルが{g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}妨害された{/g}敵の近接攻撃を回避した場合、その敵は即座に最小のAPを消費する攻撃で隣接するランダムな味方を攻撃し、必ずクリティカルヒットになる。

languages.text:
Киберорел получает +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g} и наносит на 150% больше урона. Также он получает +{uip|Dodge|cdd71475a76f46adb072f009748e5c1a}% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} от атак в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g}, совершаемых врагом, чей {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}обзор заблокирован{/g}.
Когда киберорел уклоняется от атаки в ближнем бою, совершаемой врагом, чей {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}обзор заблокирован{/g}, этот враг немедленно совершает {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическое попадание{/g} по своему случайному союзнику на соседней клетке, используя атаку, требующую меньше всего {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The cyber-eagle gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and deals +150% more damage. The cyber-eagle gains +{uip|Dodge|cdd71475a76f46adb072f009748e5c1a}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} against the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g}.
If the cyber-eagle dodges the {g|f:1e22c265a12744cc95a03d26b6c3cef9}obstructed{/g} enemy's melee attack, that enemy immediately {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} its random adjacent ally using the lowest {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}-cost attack, scoring a guaranteed {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g}.
